title: other-methodologies-two-and-three
description: This schema reflects the data specification for methodology codes two and three accepted by the BDC system when making Fixed Bulk data challenges.

contact_name.description: Full name of the individual contact associated with the crowdsource submission.

contact_email.description: Email address of the individual contact associated with the crowdsource submission.

contact_phone.description: Phone number of the individual contact associated with the crowdsource submission.

provider_id.description: Unique identifier for the fixed service provider subject to the crowdsource submission.

brand_name.description: Brand name of the service subject to the crowdsourcesubmission, as shown on the Broadband Map.

technology.description: Code for the technology of the service subject to the crowdsource submission, as shown on the Broadband Map.

location_id.description: Unique identifier for the location, from the Broadband Serviceable Location Fabric, about which crowdsource information on fixed broadband availability is being submitted.

data_vintage.description: Vintage date of fixed broadband availability data about which crowdsource information is being submitted.

category_code.description: Code identifying the category of fixed service provider crowdsource submission.

request_date.description: As relevant, enter the most recent date associated with the category_codeabove, such as the date a service request was denied or the date the filerbecame aware of the circumstances.

request_method_code.description: As relevant, enter the communication method associated with the category_code and request_date above, such as how a service request was denied or how the filer became aware of the circumstances.

evidence_description.description: Narrative description of the evidence in support of the crowdsourced submission.
